response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which holds immense value for you at $1,200,000. I am offering this extraordinary opportunity to acquire it at a special price tailored to make it accessible while still ensuring a fair return for us. My proposal is to sell the product to you for $950,000. This price not only reflects the product's worth but also allows for a reasonable profit margin. I believe this offer presents an excellent opportunity for both of us to benefit. Please let me know if you are interested in proceeding with this offer.", "product_price": 950000}
